page.title: 19BELLINGHAM CHURCHES.
page.content: There are three priests in the Bellingham area.One of the priests actually covers 800 square miles,from the Cheviot Hills down to about Cumbria.They visit the sick weekly,the infirm monthly,and the ordinary twice a year.At a service they get a regular basis of about 50 people.The priests think that the Bellingham area is more real than anywhere else in Northumberland,as there are more people involved in looking after each other.The priests are launching a new {Good Neighbours}scheme,they are not very optimistic,but are sure it will fill a small need.People will be asked to keep an eye on elderly neighbours, to ensure that they are always cared for.
